'''''Middle-earth: The Wizards Casual Companion''''' is a source-book for the [[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]].

== From the publisher ==

This is the perfect guide for both the casual gamer and Tolkien fan alike. This 48-page book is filled with basic deck strategy and helpful hints to get the casual gamer up and running. Also included are Beginner through Advanced decks, scenarios, solitaire rules, strategy hints, and plenty of Tolkien trivia and quotes.
